metadata.title: CVE-2022-34477 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The MediaError message property should be consistent to avoid leakinginformation about cross-origin resources; however for a same-sitecross-origin resource, the message could have leaked information enablingXS-Leaks attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 102.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34477` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
